mapper.select: select LAWSUIT_ID, COURTROOM_ID, LAWSUIT_START_DATE, LAWSUIT_END_DATE, PROKURATOR_CARD_ID, SEDZIA_CARD_ID from INF132340.SPRAWA where LAWSUIT_ID = #{lawsuitId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
